name: Blooming Death
description:
Fight for a meaningful death in this 1st person action plant-former. Use your powers of absorption to borrow foes abilities as you find a way to peaceful peak to rest in tranquillity.

As Dandi, an elderly dandelion, it is your goal to reach the top of peaceful peak to rest peacefully where your seeds will spread across the land. However, the path to your goal is blocked by a gate. To pass you will need to obtain the 2 keys guarded by King Catti and Lord Anni. With death comes the benefit of taking the powers from those that killed you.

Features:

  • Absorb attackers powers when you are defeated.
  • Navigate the bad-lands to find a way to peaceful peak.
  • Fight dangerous (and rather grumpy) insects with your leafblade.

Controls:

W = Move Forward

A = Move Left

S = Move Backwards

D = Move Right

SPACE = Jump

Left mouse = Attack

E = Interact (Burn Down Walls)

University of Chester project details

developed in the 2021 University of Chester game jam. The game was made by the team DJ Sam under the theme of “Benefit from death”, The game was made over the course of 3 days by 5 University of Chester Students from different course levels.

  • 1 Level 4 games dev
  • 1 Level 6 non games dev (considered l4)
  • 3 level 5 games dev
